item.title: What to answer to 'mamamatay rin tayong lahat'
item.description: This may seem.. morbid. While I do admit that I sometimes say “Mamamatay din tayong lahat” in an escapist manner (albeit true), I do acknowledge that it is true, comforting, and a good way to move forward when it comes to handling problems. However, this acceptance into the finite nature of life also makes one prone to not living ceasing each day. Embracing stoicism is a good way to avoid that mistake.
